name: The Creature (RodFireProductions)
description:
Adrian decides to take a break from everything and camp out in the woods for a weekend. Something approaches their tent on a late night.

Features:

  • 1 sprite
  • 1 background
  • >1k words (~975)
  • 1 song
  • 1 sound effect
  • 1 ending
  • And created by 1 developer

Created in one week for O2A2 2022.

The creature is referred to with vi/vir pronouns.

The web version doesn't work in Chrome (or on mobile). I recommend FireFox.

Meme
